parameters.command: =bash -c "PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]} -U postgres -d picker_wheel -t -A -c \"SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(t)) FROM (SELECT h.*, w.name as wheel_name FROM spin_history h LEFT JOIN wheels w ON h.wheel_id = w.id WHERE ('{{ $json.session_id }}' = 'all' OR h.session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}') ORDER BY h.timestamp DESC LIMIT {{ $json.limit }}) t\" || echo '[]'"

=bash -c "PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]} -U postgres -d picker_wheel -t -A -c \"SELECT json_build_object('total_spins', COUNT(*), 'days_active', COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(timestamp)), 'most_common', (SELECT result FROM spin_history WHERE ('{{ $json.session_id }}' = 'all' OR session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}') GROUP BY result ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1), 'frequency', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spin_history WHERE ('{{ $json.session_id }}' = 'all' OR session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}') GROUP BY result ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1)) FROM spin_history WHERE ('{{ $json.session_id }}' = 'all' OR session_id = '{{ $json.session_id }}')\" || echo '{}'"
